attributes.action: make England international football and cricket matches available to every English person wishing to watch the matches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England football team play a vital qualifying match against Estonia  tonight but like many other England football and cricket matches is only available to fans with Sky Sports facilities.  I believe that as  citizens of England, I and others who have no access to Sky Sports should be able to view all these games on ordinary terrestorial television. The same applies to all other England International Sporting events.  Other countries in the United Kingdom should also be given access to these events when their home country takes part.
